title: 02/03/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/03/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to Jim Harbaugh returning to Ann Arbor. Why wasn't he offered the Vikings job? Seton checks in from Houston, Texas as he's trying to avoid the weather in the midwest. And Ross Tucker explains why he thinks the NFL wouldn't make Stephen Ross sell the Dolphins, even if Brian Flores' and Hue Jackson's accusations are found to be true. He does expect heavy fines though.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to Jim Harbaugh returning to Ann Arbor. Why wasn't he offered the Vikings job? Seton checks in from Houston, Texas as he's trying to avoid the weather in the midwest. And Ross Tucker explains why he thinks the NFL wouldn't make Stephen Ross sell the Dolphins, even if Brian Flores' and Hue Jackson's accusations are found to be true. He does expect heavy fines though.
